warez...

Subject: FWD: account under your hosting sharing warez...

MIME element (text/plain)
---------- Original Message ----------------------------------
From: PHPCow Admin <admin@phpcow.com>
Reply-To: PHPCow Admin <admin@phpcow.com>
Date: Fri, 3 Nov 2006 18:31:19 +0400 
 
Hello, 
 
It has come to our notice that http://www.ajiek.com is sharing pirated
version of our software PHPCow under the link
http://ajiek.com/rapid/phpCow.v2.0._RETAIL_De-Zended_Vodanh.rar 
 
You can check the original forum post:
http://www.swalif.net/softs/showthread.php?t=178313  
 
This is a reverse engineered (dezended) copy of software being illegally
shared. 
We see the domain is under your network:
http://www.dnsstuff.com/tools/whois.ch?ip=69.57.136.75 
 
We would solicit your cooperation in having this account blocked and/or
content removed as it is in violation of Copyright Laws. Should you
desire any information to faciliate a decision/ action in this regard, I
would be more than happy to divulge the same to you. 
 
Soliciting cooperation and action action the above nmoted site. 
 
Regards
Joseph Norton
PHPCow Manager
http://phpcow.com/
===================
tel: 866 932 5258
===================
